content:
# I successfully crafted 4 iron gear wheels, and my inventory now shows that I have 1 iron plate remaining along with the coal.
# 
# With the iron gear wheels crafted, I can now proceed to build more complex machinery or components for my factory.
# 
# Next, I will check if I have the necessary materials to craft a burner mining drill, which will help automate resource gathering.

# Checking the recipe for the burner mining drill to confirm the requirements.
burner_mining_drill_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)
print(f'Burner Mining Drill Recipe: {burner_mining_drill_recipe}')  # Displaying the recipe for the burner mining drill.
